original_text: So David and all the people with him set out and crossed the Jordan. By daybreak, no one was left who had not crossed the Jordan.
korean_text: 다윗이 일어나 모든 백성과 함께 요단을 건널새 새벽까지 한 사람도 요단을 건너지 못한 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: So David and all the people with him set out
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다윗과 그와 함께한 모든 사람들이 출발했고

sentences.original_text: who had not crossed the Jordan
